html:
4.26.18  5:01 am   What am I supposed to do?

     check with your leader

4.26.18  5:00 am   Why isn't La de da de da de da de day oh on Google play music?

     because when i went to send/upload the song, i found something shocking which is that 'google play' and 'youtube music' are now in the same checkbox (they didn't use to be). that means if you send it to google play, it also sends it to 'youtube music.' youtube music is probably pretty important but i have avoided it in the past, because basically what they do is they upload your song to another music channel, and i always got scared that this could somehow cause conflict issues with my songs on my own channel. and i was too scared to deal with it at the time. but this time around i was more brave and i decided to do it

4.26.18  4:34 am   how long have you been wanting to get the word "whenst" into a song?

     i never thought of it before, but now that i've done it it feels like something i have been building toward for my entire life

4.26.18  4:22 am   Is there a deeper meaning to your songs

     than what

      or are they meaningless masterpieces?

     they have a lot of meaning. music, songs, and audio/visual content in general is something i find extremely meaningful, regardless of how it's done

4.26.18  4:17 am   When will you write something in a minor key?

     i've surely already done it

4.26.18  3:48 am   Why Can't we all just get along?

     that sounds kind of boring

4.26.18  2:59 am   how often do you upload

     every day

4.26.18  2:53 am   If everything was the same only you didnt do videos, but you had the same view of things as you do now, what job/career/hobby would you aimed for?

     you'd have to explain why i wouldn't do videos

4.26.18  2:52 am   Why do humans sway their arms when they walk?

     to counteract the walking movement and stay balanced

4.26.18  2:51 am   did you self teach to play my emotions so well

     i taught myself to play mine, and yours could be similar

4.26.18  2:33 am   How do you know which melodies/song ideas/riffs are worth pursuing?

     if i like them

      I often come up with guitar riff that I think is interesting but it doesn't seem to fit into a song immediately so I'm left wondering if I should pursue it or not

     if you like it, then it can be used. the trick is figuring out how. you can get close to the solution by really focusing on the original essence of how the idea came to be in the first place. the object of the game is to capture the exact way you originally felt about it, and deliver that feeling to the audience in the most efficient way possible

4.26.18  12:42 am   Would you say your songwriting has improved over the last 10 years?

     yes

4.26.18  12:37 am   do you regret making a questions page yet?

     no
4.26.18  12:34 am   What's your favorite thing to think about?

4.26.18  12:30 am   how can i convince my parents to buy me a spaceship?

     start by asking for a much much larger and more expensive spaceship

4.26.18  12:16 am   how to swim?

     try to climb the water

4.25.18  11:56 pm   What's your favorite part of editing a video, and why?

     finding a way to make my thoughts and ideas appear on the screen

4.25.18  11:53 pm   Does silence count as music?

     you have to register it first but yes

4.25.18  11:53 pm   Are you a good person?

      yes but i am trying to get even better

4.25.18  11:49 pm   is this a trick?

     yes but no

4.25.18  11:24 pm   i know you've said before that you like to release your songs one by one. if you were to make an album though, would you be concerned with making the album greater than the sum of its parts

     i would certainly try to put them in the best order, but i think 'greater than the sum of its parts' is a little much to ask of simply a list of songs

      (i.e. thinking about how the songs supplement each other in the context of the album and stuff like that) or would you just continue to write songs as you're used to and maybe arrange them in a way that makes sense but not think of it as "i'm making an album here" but rather "i'm releasing my songs that i would have released anyway as an album here"? would you find the additional creative challenges that come with creating an album exiting?

     if i'm going to make a 45-60 minute project that works well as a whole, i would want to use more than just songs. if it really is just songs then i say let the songs roam free

4.25.18  11:21 pm   would you ever commit tax fraud

     if the mood strikes

4.25.18  11:18 pm   You're music is really uplifting and great, are you gonna release an album or EP at any point?

     i think i prefer to release songs individually, which is great news for you because you don't have to wait for me to finish more songs before hearing a song

      I'd love to purchase it and support you.

     you can purchase songs, or t-shirts, or if you don't want the merchandise but you just want to support me you can do that here or here. or you can simply watch/listen to the content for free if you prefer. the only thing i don't particularly like is saying you 'would support' without actually doing it, because there are plenty of options available to you if you would like to do that

4.25.18  11:18 pm   What's you favorite cow?

     holy

4.25.18  11:15 pm   just wanted to say I loved seeing the Roundhay garden scene in the new vid. I always thought the dude looked kinda funny walking like that and it was nice to see you had appreciation for it too 

     everything looks funny at 12 frams per second

4.25.18  11:12 pm   which is a more rewarding feeling: pressing export from fcp for the last time on a project or hitting upload?

     upload, because there are fewer things left to take care of after that step. even more rewarding when i have actually finished all the steps to the upload/release process

4.25.18  11:06 pm   why haven't you put "and the day goes on" onto the songs page?

     i have

4.25.18  11:04 pm   are the songs you post an expression of your feelings?

     yes, and more

4.25.18  11:02 pm   have you ever had a company send you a sponsorship deal,

     many times

      and if so, what is the weirdest one you've received?

     i think i got one for skin care products

4.25.18  10:52 pm   Do I belong?

     yes

4.25.18  10:47 pm   Do you think you'll make a album one day?

     i think i prefer to release songs individually

4.25.18  10:44 pm   what time period do you live in?

     the holocene epoch

4.25.18  10:39 pm   How can i be happy again

     how did you do it before

4.25.18  10:24 pm   have you ever considered wearing makeup?

     almost

4.25.18  10:21 pm   what's the meaning of anything?

     could be anything

4.25.18  10:12 pm   how to play the banjo?

     probably the same as guitar but all the notes and chords are different

4.25.18  10:02 pm   is adgo (And the Day Goes On) based on how you are starting to get braver and do more things,

     no

     like, for example, go on tour/live show, go to vidcon, add crazier stuff to notebook [you said you are but idk], and/or getting a team, as in OTHER PEOPLE, to work with you? btw you said u were not uploading vids +4 min without a 'team'.

4.25.18  10:01 pm   Why does a why occur in a sentence with why in it?

     because you said so

4.25.18  9:38 pm   sorry if someone else already asked- do you have a document of the lyrics of "and the day goes on"?

     check the lyrics page

4.25.18  9:38 pm   is that purple guy with spiky hair in the new song supposed to represent you?

     no

      if not, did you name it?

     could be you

4.25.18  9:37 pm   You talk alot about hiring a team to help with bigger projects like hotewig or hoj, but how would you do this without losing your whole style?

     i have no idea, that's why i haven't done it

      I feel like your style is just to unique to be executed well by anyone else.

4.25.18  9:30 pm   Did you recently write this new song, or is it from your backlog from 2010-2011

     it was written on may 26, 2016. but the verse melody/chord figure was something that had been sitting in the list since (checks records) march 31, 2015

4.25.18  9:21 pm   Will you rate some fruit, please?

     5

4.25.18  9:21 pm   what's your favourite definition for the word "marquee"

     a sign

4.25.18  9:16 pm   whats your favourite topping for pancakes

     the plate

4.25.18  9:15 pm   have you ever considered composing for a video game

     it would be nice if i get to make the game too

4.25.18  9:04 pm   Do you have a secrete collection of archived songs?

     written, yes. recorded, no

4.25.18  9:04 pm   did you even end up eating your floor?

     i have a liquid floor

4.25.18  9:03 pm   What kind of person should I strive to be?

     make a list of all the kinds and then mix them together

4.25.18  8:53 pm   Should I record the conversations I have with myself?

     sure
